bibl.title: The ""Alexandrian World Chronicle"", its Consularia and the Date of the Destruction of the Serapeum (with an Appendix on the List of Praefecti Augustales).

VI]. - The date of the destruction of the Serapeum. - Pp. 102-111: Appendix: The list of praefecti augustales.

bibl.title: Millennium. Jahrbuch zu Kultur und Geschichte des ersten Jahrtausends n.Chr.

bibl.seg: R.W. Burgess & Jitse H.F. Dijkstra, The ""Alexandrian World Chronicle"", its Consularia and the Date of the Destruction of the Serapeum (with an Appendix on the List of Praefecti Augustales).
Millennium 10 (2013) pp. 39-113, 1 fig., 4 tabl., 2 pll. coul.

Introduction. - The Nature of the Text and its Place in the Late Antique Consularia Traditions. - Description of the papyrus [P. Golenischev = P.
